title.a: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire 09/05/2022 INC#0984

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0984; 04:12PM; 2843 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cQg2vW; #BoyleHeights; With 19 engines and 13 trucks on scene from LAFD, with assistance from LA County Fire Department, this incident is classified as a "Major Emergency." One additional firefighter was transported in fair condition after sustaining injuries related to falling debris (4 total FF transported). No other reported injuries. All active flames have been extinguished by over 180 firefighters in two hours. Five occupancies in the one-story row of commercials were involved in the blaze. LAFD Heavy Equipment and RS3 are on scene assisting. This will be an extensive overhaul. Thankfully, LAFD CERT volunteers have generously responded on a volunteer basis to support firefighters with hydration and rehab during this extreme heatwave.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC18 CE43 CE59 CE84 CM20 CM22 CM3 E10 E105 E13 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E226 E227 E233 E235 E25 E250 E261 E27 E35 E4 E44 E55 E66 E69 E88 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 FC1 HE1 HR3 JT1 JT2 PH1 RA12 RA13 RA14 RA209 RA27 RA3 RA65 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T26 T27 T3 T33 T35 T50 T61 T9 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire MEDIA STAGING 09/05/2022 INC#0984

item.description: Update MEDIA STAGING Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0984; 04:19PM; 2843 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cQg2vW; Boyle Heights; Media, please stage at 2900 E Olympic Blvd (Intersection of Olympic Blvd and Camulos St.); FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC18 CE43 CE59 CE84 CM20 CM22 E10 E105 E13 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E226 E227 E233 E235 E25 E250 E261 E27 E35 E4 E44 E55 E66 E69 E88 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 HR3 JT1 JT2 PH1 RA12 RA13 RA14 RA209 RA27 RA3 RA65 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T26 T27 T3 T33 T35 T50 T61 T9 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#0984; 03:55PM; 2843 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cQg2vW; #BoyleHeights; Currently, more than 180 firefighters continue fighting the blaze, which has now burned five occupancies in this one-story row of commercials. Firefighters remain in the defensive mode. At least one occupancy has sustained a partial collapse. Three firefighters encountered an electrical hazard and are being evaluated by paramedics on scene. All three appear to be in good condition. No other reported injuries. So far, there are no reported injuries. MEDIA: Please coordinate with Captain Weireter, who is already on scene, for media requests.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC18 CE43 CE59 CE84 CM20 CM22 E10 E105 E13 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E226 E227 E233 E235 E25 E250 E261 E27 E35 E4 E44 E55 E66 E69 E88 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 EM13 HE1 HR3 JT1 JT2 PH1 RA12 RA13 RA209 RA27 RA65 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T26 T27 T3 T33 T35 T50 T61 T9 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#0984; 02:30PM; 2843 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cQg2vW; #BoyleHeights; Fire now through the roof of the large one-story commercial building. Additional task forces requested. All firefighters operating in defensive mode (fighting the fire from the exterior).; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E2 E202 E203 E210 E211 E227 E25 E27 E9 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA12 RA13 RA27 RA65 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0984; 02:12PM; 2853 E 11th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KVTWos; #BoyleHeights; One-story commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E2 E202 E25 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0184; 03:10AM; 3918 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AS5B2M; Koreatown; The first 32 firefighters on scene of a 6-story center-hallway apartment building found fire on the 5th floor. Crews rapidly ascended to extinguish the flames in just 12 minutes (3:22am). No reported injuries.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E27 E29 E52 E6 E82 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA13 RA3 RA35 RA52 RA803 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1529; 05:30PM; 10377 N Rincon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cSuMu5; #Pacoima; Despite high ambient temperatures, 26 firefighters took just 24 minutes, in a well-coordinated offensive attack, to access, confine, and fully extinguish the flames in a small one-story home (755 sq-ft) which involved the living space and the attic. No reported injuries. Cause under active investigation by LAFD Fire Investigators.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC12 CE84 E275 E298 E75 E81 E91 RA898 RA98 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1529; 05:06PM; 10377 N Rincon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cSuMu5; #Pacoima; One-story home with fire showing.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E75 E81 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Red Line; INC#0395; 05:30AM; 899 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2UzBdZG; #Downtown; One adult female was found unconscious on the tracks, and in contact with the third rail (supplies electric current to trains). Firefighter-paramdics removed her from the tracks and are transporting her in grave condition. Nothing further.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 E10 E13 E203 E209 E211 E9 EM1 HR3 RA9 SQ21 T11 T3 T9; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange
